</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

## GroupPermission

GroupPermission contains details for the related object and the permissions
the group provides (or removes in the case of blocked) to the object within the
organization

<p style={{ marginBottom: "0.4em" }}><strong>Implements</strong></p>

- [Node](interfaces#node)

<p style={{ marginBottom: "0.4em" }}><strong>Fields</strong></p>

<table>
<thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
objectType<br />
<a href="scalars#string"><code>String!</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>the type of object the permissions are for, e.g. Program, Control, etc.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
permissions<br />
<a href="enums#permission"><code>Permission!</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>the permissions the group has in relation to the object, e.g. EDITOR, VIEWER, BLOCKED</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
id<br />
<a href="scalars#id"><code>ID!</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>the ID of the object the group was given permissions to</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
displayID<br />
<a href="scalars#string"><code>String</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>the displayID of the object the group was given permissions to</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
name<br />
<a href="scalars#string"><code>String</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>the  name of the object the group was given permissions to</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

</tr>
<tr>
<td>

<a href="scalars#string"><code>String</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>revision of the object as a semver (e.g. v1.0.0), by default any update will bump the patch version, unless the revision_bump field is set</p>
</td>
</tr>

<td>
ownerID<br />
<a href="scalars#string"><code>String</code></a>
</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
name<br />
<a href="scalars#string"><code>String!</code></a>
</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
</tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

<p style={{ marginBottom: "0.4em" }}><strong>Fields</strong></p>

<table>
<thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
edges<br />
<a href="objects#subscriberedge"><code>[SubscriberEdge]</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>A list of edges.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
pageInfo<br />
<a href="objects#pageinfo"><code>PageInfo!</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>Information to aid in pagination.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
totalCount<br />
<a href="scalars#int"><code>Int!</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

## SubscriberCreatePayload

<p style={{ marginBottom: "0.4em" }}><strong>Fields</strong></p>

<table>
<thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
subscriber<br />
<a href="objects#subscriber"><code>Subscriber!</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>Created subscriber</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

## SubscriberDeletePayload

Return response for deleteSubscriber mutation

<p style={{ marginBottom: "0.4em" }}><strong>Fields</strong></p>

<table>
<thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
email<br />

</td>
<td>
<p>Deleted subscriber email</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

## SubscriberEdge

An edge in a connection.

<p style={{ marginBottom: "0.4em" }}><strong>Fields</strong></p>

<table>
<thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
node<br />
<a href="objects#subscriber"><code>Subscriber</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
cursor<br />
<a href="scalars#cursor"><code>Cursor!</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
